thx for the up mate...great game indeed

For those that don't know instead of mounting it onto a disc you can instead use a virtual daemon http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/home install it, tell it how many virtual cds you want it to see, mount the iso/cso and it'll run the iso/cso as though it were a real cd.
